short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple fill-in-the-blank quiz for memorization.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Inspired by Dr. Brad's Memorization Technique
To help with Memorization

How to use:
1. Fill in what you want to memorize
2. Click Fill in the blanks
3. Click on the blanks to reveal the words your trying to memorize

To restart click on the icon.

Let's help make more Professionals
